attributes.action: Scrap: Food and Accomodation charges for single personnel, and Scrap charges for Married Quarters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When the Government announces the annual pay increase to the Armed Forces it then increases Food & Accomodation charges and, Rents for married quarters, by the same percentage; THIS IS A RIP OFF! They only use these charges to recover most of the pay increase, OUTRAGEOOUS.
